concept: MCQs on data models, entities and relationships.

challenges.title: Q1: Entity in ER Model
challenges.description: In an ER diagram, an Entity is:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) A real-world object that can be uniquely identified
b) A set of all attributes in a database
c) A many-to-many relationship
d) A primary key of any table
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: Relational Model Type
challenges.description: The relational model represents data using:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Trees
b) Graphs
c) Tables (relations)
d) Files and folders
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
